final_poem:
Softly falls the midnight rain
A million tears upon the ground
Gentle rhythm, soothing sound
Calming souls, all around

Petals lift, and flowers sway
Drinking in the watery day
Raindrops on the roof above
A symphony of endless love

In the puddles, reflections stare
Ripples dance, without a care
The world's washed clean, revived anew
As rain whispers secrets true
